name: WREX = Salesforce + Zillow tech combined
slogan: Merging Salesforce with Zillow like technology, creating the first B2B & B2C Global Marketplace
description:
WREX - the World Real Estate Xchange, has built & combined Salesforce with Zillow like technologies, creating the most powerful all-in-one B2B & B2C global marketplace. WREX’s platform provides an AI data-driven approach to Residential & Commercial real estate, helping stable, predict & generate additional revenue streams for individual Brokers, Estate Agencies & Enterprises around the world. WREX’s proptech platform provides a new way to securely refer, track & record sales, leads & properties, helping build strong relationships & cross-pollination between businesses, staff & their competitors, increasing sales locally, nationally & internationally.

In a $20 Billion annual marketplace, WREX SaaS has merged Real Estate, Technology & Innovation to provide a seamless on the go solution & white label licensing model. WREX allows companies to gain valuable business insights via live-performance reports & introduces a whole new way to monetise & increase sales globally.

WREX's SaaS platform helps independent Brokers, Estate Agencies & Enterprises create their own personally branded marketplace for internal & external use, helping build a unified ecosystem, shape infrastructure & implement regulations across multiple offices worldwide.

jobs.title: Seeking outstanding Senior Vice President of Sales for AI Proptech Marketplace (SaaS)
jobs.description:
Combining Salesforce + Zillow = WREX (World Real Estate Xchange)

We are currently expanding and exploring the potential for a SVP to assist in building the business, this opportunity will offer the chance to work with an exciting and rapidly expanding start-up with global sights. 

This role is ideal for ambitious, intelligent and entrepreneurial individuals looking to build a lucrative and exciting career with a revolutionary company within the AI Proptech SaaS space.

What we are looking for:

The Senior Vice President of Sales & Strategy will be responsible for growing company services/product/revenue through the successful selling of WREX’s SaaS model to enterprises, global agent to agent platform and creation of partner programs, as well as building the WREX brand by developing a clearly differentiated brand positioning, implementing integrated sales and strategy plans for all offerings under the firm’s product portfolio. Creating new product offerings and structuring sales funnels to help expand WREX’s market. 
This individual will be directly responsible for identifying/leveraging their contacts to promote business development across all aspects of the WREX enterprise and global growth strategy; includes developing strategic relationships/partnerships, building and managing sales pipelines, and maximizing revenue globally. Handling escalations and participating directly in complex sales situations to negotiate and/or resolve disputes and ensure customer satisfaction. Conducts regional sales forecasts, growth forecast, territory planning, demand generation, deal strategy development and trend analysis.

Assists in the creation of division strategy and consults with senior management in providing direction to ensure growth and financial success. Ensures a consistent approach of organizational policies and procedures. Demonstrated leadership and people management skills. Strong communication skills, analytical skills, thorough understanding of product development and product management.

• Develop plans and strategies for developing business and achieving the company’s sales goals. 
• Create a culture of success and ongoing business and goal achievement – possibly more important than the first item on this list.
• Driving sales executive performance in a client-oriented solution selling approach, across our enterprise portfolio.
• Defining sales strategies and market campaigns identifying market opportunities and maximizing pipeline development and conversion.
• Building a platform for identifying new customer contacts, securing and leading sales meeting with new contacts and co-coordinating subject matter expert input in support of these meetings.
• End to end responsibility for leading opportunities through the deal cycle.
• Managing customer requirement - influencing strategy and Solution options, through to defining and enacting a sales closure plan and contract negotiations.
• Accountable for certain client relationships; typically working from senior decision maker level to c-level.


The SVP will be responsible for growing company services/product/revenue through the successful selling of WREX’s SaaS model to enterprises, global agent to agent platform and creation of partner programs, as well as building the WREX brand by developing a clearly differentiated brand positioning,
implementing integrated sales and strategy plans for all offerings under the firm’s product portfolio. Creating new product offerings and structuring sales funnels to help expand WREX’s market.

This individual will be directly responsible for identifying/leveraging their contacts to promote business development across all aspects of the WREX enterprise and global growth strategy; includes developing strategic relationships/partnerships, building and managing sales pipelines, and maximizing revenue globally. Handling escalations and participating directly in
complex sales situations to negotiate and/or resolve disputes and ensure customer satisfaction. Conducts regional sales forecasts, growth forecast, territory planning, demand generation, deal strategy development and trend analysis.

What you get :

- Ability to earn over $180k-200k+ a year!
- Uncapped commission structure, we look after our staff and believe in fair opportunities for those who deliver. 
- Growth opportunities to build your own sales team and expand offices globally. 
- An equity stake in the company. (Depending on deliverables and revenue generated).
- Pushing the technical AI boundaries, seeing the company grow globally becoming a mainstream name within the Enterprise SaaS industry.
- Rapid growth with the company through its global expansion.
- Mirroring the tech model and expanding into multiple markets such as: Rentals, Transportation and hotels.
- Exiting within 5 years via IPO or trade sale.
- Be apart of a disruptive proptech model which is looking to redefine the industry as we know it.

jobs.title: WREX (merging Salesforce + Zillow tech) - seeking COO or CMO
jobs.description:
We are currently expanding and exploring the potential for a COO and CMO to assist in building the business, this opportunity will offer the chance to work with an exciting and rapidly expanding start-up with global sights. 

This role is ideal for ambitious, intelligent and entrepreneurial individuals looking to build a lucrative and exciting career with a revolutionary company within the AI Proptech SaaS space.

What we are looking for:

- Co-Founder, a forward thinker pushing the boundaries of a very exciting company within a $2.9 Trillion annual marketplace
- Ideally knowledge of the Real Estate industry with Enterprise, SaaS, or contacts within this space is a big bonus. 
- Involvement in all future planning and expansion aspects of the company
- Building sales funnels, affiliate partnerships and key relationships to help increase rapid growth globally. 
- Help raising capital to gain further traction and expansion 
- If CMO we are looking for someone who is a marketing guru, with history of scaling companies or working with IPO's.
- Extremely attractive prospects with uncapped commission structures.
- Ability to build and oversee a global team.

The COO will be responsible for growing company services/product/revenue through the successful selling of WREX’s SaaS model to enterprises, global agent to agent platform and creation of partner programs, as well as building the WREX brand by developing a clearly differentiated brand positioning,
implementing integrated sales and strategy plans for all offerings under the firm’s product portfolio. Creating new product offerings and structuring sales funnels to help expand WREX’s market.

Handling escalations and participating directly in
complex sales situations to negotiate and/or resolve disputes and ensure customer satisfaction. Conducts regional sales forecasts, growth forecast, territory planning, demand generation, deal strategy development and trend analysis.

What you get back:

- Co-Founder COO status. 
- An equity stake in the company. (Depending on experience and involvement with the company we would increase or decrease this accordingly)

- Mirroring the tech model and expanding into multiple markets such as: Rentals, Transportation and hotels
